title: Will you be able to sell your home? Use our calculator to search where you live
text:
The property market has ground to a halt across much of the UK, with house price growth at its lowest since September 2012, according to the Land Registry.

But Britain is a patchwork of micro-markets, and within those blanket averages are local highs and lows, turbo-powered towns and slumping cities. While prices are normally the thing that holds the headlines, transaction data is often a more accurate indicator of market health.

What's happening in the property market where you live? We’ve created a tool for you to search your postcode and access the transaction and sale price data for your area.

The general trend from this data is that prices are up in areas where transactions have dropped...
description: The property market has ground to a halt across much of the UK, with house price growth at its lowest since September 2012, according to the Land Registry.
